description: This file declares functions and macros for media browsing and device discovery via RPC in a DLNA/UPnP context. It includes function prototypes for initializing/releasing communication, discovering media servers, retrieving server information, and browsing server content.

methods.name: InitializeRPC
methods.description: Initializes the RPC communication between rdkservice and xupnp DLNA component.

methods.name: getDiscoveredMediaServers
methods.description: Retrieves the count of discovered media servers.

methods.name: getDiscoveredMediaServerAt
methods.description: Retrieves the name and UDN of a specific media server at a given index.

methods.name: browseContentOnServer
methods.description: Fetches directory contents from the specified media server.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up the IPC communication channel.
